Zaki Ibrahim bụ onye South Africa na Canada na-agụ egwu
Egwú ya jikọtara , R$B,soul na jazz.

A mụrụ ya na British Columbia site nna si South Africa na nne si United Kingdom, Ibrahim nọrọ na nwata ya dị ka ihe ọ kọwara dị ka "nwa amaala nke ụwa",ma bie n'oge dị iche iche na Canada, South Africa, United Kingdom na France Nna ya, Zane Ibrahim, bụ onye mgbasa ozi redio na South Africa, onye bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere ụlọ ọrụ redio obodo  bu Bush Radio.

Ọ kwagara Toronto, Ontario n'etiti afọ 2000, ma n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama n'ogbọ egwu obodo ahụ. O wepụtara EP mbụ ya, Shö (Iqra in Orange), n'afọ 2006. N'ịgbaso otu ihe ngosi na El Mocambo n'afọ 2007, ndị otu mmepụta ya na ndị na-akwado ndị egwu guzobere usoro mgbakọ ozugbo iji mepụta ma tinye ihe ndekọ diski nke ihe ngosi ahụ ka emechara maka ire ere ozugbo; usoro ịzụta mbipụta gbatịkwuru nke ọma n'èzí ọnụ ụzọ klọb ahụ.
O wepụtara EP nke abụọ, Eclectica (Episodes in Purple), n'afọ 2008

Ihe ngosi ndụ ya iji kwado EP gụnyere mpụta ya na Bedouin Soundclash na 2008 MuchMusic Video Awards, na mmeghe ngosi maka Erykah Badu na Massey Hall. O nwetara nhọpụta Juno Award maka R&B / Soul Recording of the Year na Juno Awards nke afọ 2009 maka egwu ya "Money". E tinyere egwu ya "Ansomnia" na ụda ihe nkiri afọ 2010 bụ For Colored Girls: Music From and Inspired by the Original Motion Picture Soundtrack

E wepụtara abọm mbụ ya, Every Opposite, n'afọ 2012.  A họpụtara Albọm a maka 2013 Polaris Music Prize n'abali iri na atọ nke ọnwa June afọ 2013, ma mesịa kpọọ aha ya na ndepụta dị mkpirikpi N'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa July afọ 2013.
Ọ bi ugbu a na Toronto Ontario.
